events.message: I recently purchased a jacket, but it doesn't fit well. I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The customer reported a return request for a purchased item due to size issues, qualifying for a refund process.
Assigning the refund case to the returns specialist team for further processing and customer assistance.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear the jacket didn't fit. I'd be happy to assist you with the return and refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and let us know if the item has been used or damaged?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The jacket is brand new, I have not used it or altered the tags.
Thank you for the details. You may send the jacket back using the prepaid return label sent to your email, and we will process your refund within 5 business days after receipt.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I will ship the item back today.
We've received your returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear on your original payment method shortly.
Just checking in to ensure you have received your refund successfully and if there is anything else we can help you with.
Since the refund was completed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support!
